dcterms:creator: M. Everingham
L. Van Gool
C. K. I. Williams
J. Winn
A. Zisserman
dcterms:description: The PASCAL Visual Object Classes Challenge dataset is used for evaluating object detection and image segmentation tasks. It contains a large collection of images with annotations for various object classes.
dcterms:title: PASCAL Visual Object Classes (VOC) Dataset
